rules.natural: Either the legislation is under expedited review, or if the drug passes the safety test, then the drug meets the standards set by the legislation.
Either the drug is recalled, or in the case that it is not true that the game necessitates a skill, the drug is on the black market.
If there is quality control in drug manufacturing, then the drug is not recalled.
Under the condition that a patent is granted for the drug, the company holds exclusive rights to the drug.
